cheatsheet.title: Start and connect to the AUT Agent

intro.description: These steps guide you in starting the AUT Agent and connecting to it.

item.title: Starting the AUT Agent
item.description:
Start the AUT Agent via the start menu in windows:
Start AUT Agent
or start it from the command line on Unix systems.

item.title: Connect to the AUT Agent
item.description: Connect to the AUT Agent using the toolbar button.
